entry.title: Deploying OpenVPN Part 1
entry.content:
Why I want to do it

I recently started a new job. After years of working inside a “walled garden,” where I had limited access to clients and limited ability to work remotely, I’m now a consultant working mostly on short-term projects. Some of those projects are done remotely, while others require me to be at a customer’s location. Meanwhile, the team I’m working with are distributed around the globe, and our “infrastructre” consists mostly of SaaS cloud sites and a mix of equipment sitting in various people’s bedrooms and basements (including mine.)

My remote access needs are as follows:

  • I need to access systems that are on my home network remotely.
  • I need to access systems that are on the team’s network.
  • I need to be able to give other team members access to systems on my network.
